record.field: ${object.partner_id and object.partner_id.email and object.partner_id.id or False }

field.name: body_html
field.div: % set letter = object.get_objects() % set child = letter.mapped('child_id') % set firstname = child.get_list('firstname', 3, 'your children') % set s = '' if len(child) == 1 else 's'
field.p:
Herewith, you will find the last sent letter from ${firstname}!
% if object.send_mode == 'digital': Download your letter${s} here:
% for l in list(set(letter.filtered('read_url').mapped('read_url'))):
${l}
% endfor
% endif The sponsorship is terminated but we encourage you to continue praying for ${firstname} protection and blessing.
Again, we express all our gratitude for the love and the support you testified towards ${firstname} during the sponsorship.
Thanks to the collaboration between the sponsors and Compassion, we are grateful to be able to give hope to the children in need. We are at your service for any questions or comments, by calling 031 552 21 25 or by email at ${object.user_id.company_id.email}
